languages.text: {n}Скрипнув зубами, сенешаль тихо изрекает:{/n} "Раньше за такое династия фон Валанциус объявляла войну. До личной гибели обидчика".
{n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."
languages.original_text: {n}Скрипнув зубами, сенешаль тихо изрекает:{/n} "Раньше за такое династия фон Валанциус объявляла войну. До личной гибели обидчика".

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, the Seneschal says quietly:{/n} "In the old times, the von Valancius dynasty would declare war due to something like this. Until the death of the offender."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, the Seneschal says quietly:{/n} "In the old times, the von Valancius dynasty would declare war due to something like this. Until the death of the offender."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, the Seneschal says quietly:{/n} "In the days of yore, the von Valancius dynasty would have declared war because of something like this. Until the death of the offender."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, the Seneschal says quietly:{/n} "In the days of yore, the von Valancius dynasty would have declared war because of something like this. Until the death of the offender."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les dents serrées, Abélard déclare calmement :{/n} « Jadis, la dynastie von Valancius aurait vu là une raison de déclarer la guerre et se serait battue jusqu'à la mort du contrevenant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les dents serrées, Abélard déclare calmement :{/n} « Jadis, la dynastie von Valancius aurait vu là une raison de déclarer la guerre et se serait battue jusqu'à la mort du contrevenant. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Entre dientes apretados, Abelard habla con voz queda.{/n} «Antaño, la casa von Valancius habría declarado la guerra por algo como esto. Y habría luchado hasta la muerte del culpable».
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre dientes apretados, el Senescal murmura:{/n} «Antaño, la dinastía von Valancius habría declarado la guerra por algo así. Hasta la muerte del responsable».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧牙关，平静地开了口。{/n}“换做以前，若是有人胆敢这么对待对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，我们会向他宣战，直到冒犯之人被处死为止。”
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德咬紧牙关，平静地开了口。{/n}“换做以前，如果有人胆敢对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝做出这样的事情，我们的王朝会向他宣战，直到冒犯之人被处死为止。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard beißt die Zähne zusammen und sagt leise:{/n} "In früheren Zeiten hätte das Haus von Valancius für eine solche Beleidigung den Krieg erklärt. Und bis zum Tod des Übeltäters gekämpft."
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess beißt die Zähne zusammen und sagt leise:{/n} "In früheren Zeiten hätte die Dynastie von Valancius für eine solche Beleidigung den Krieg erklärt. Bis zum Tod des Übeltäters."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}歯を食いしばりながらも、アベラルドは静かに言う。{/n}「昔であれば、フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、このようなことで宣戦布告しておりました。そして、加害者が死ぬまで戦っていたことでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."

traits.locale_text: {n}歯を食いしばりながらも、アベラルドは静かに言う。{/n}「昔であれば、フォン・ヴァランシウス家は、このようなことで宣戦布告しておりました。そして、加害者が死ぬまで戦っていたことでしょう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, dişlerini sıkarken sessizce konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Eskiden olsa von Valancius Hanesi böyle bir şey uğruna savaş açardı. Fail ölene kadar da savaşmaya devam ederdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Gritting his teeth, Abelard says quietly,{/n} "In the old days, House von Valancius would have declared war over something like this. And fought until the offender was dead."
